name: df-plr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6
body: |- wceq(cplr, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cnr), wcel(cv(s1), cnr)), wex(s3, wex(s4, wex(s5, wex(s6, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cec(cop(cv(s3), cv(s4)), cer)), wceq(cv(s1), cec(cop(cv(s5), cv(s6)), cer))), wceq(cv(s2), cec(cop(co(cv(s3), cpp, cv(s5)), co(cv(s4), cpp, cv(s6))), cer))))))))))
comment: Define addition on signed reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-4.3 of [Gleason] p. 126. (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
